articles.title: Tariffs: Jaguar Land Rover says it has no plans to build cars in the US - BBC
articles.description: The comment came after the company's boss refused to rule out opening production plants in America.
articles.content:
UK-based carmaker Jaguar Land Rover has said it does not intend to produce vehicles in the US, as President Donald Trump's tariffs impact the motor industry.
